title: 1 BR apt- includes some bills (FREE WiFi, HD TV, Netflix, Deck) Sep 15
posting_body: This apartment is for Sep 15 (EMAIL to schedule an appointment to view, do not disturb tenant)
Get away from Urban area, work from home and enjoy green shady backyard with tons of spring flowers and lots of birds on your private back deck!
Lake is practically across the street, tons of trails, bird watching, town beach on the lake to enjoy your summer!!
No realtor fee!
First month + Deposit moves you in!
Please email if interested.
- Cozy and modern 1 BR /1
Bth with full kitchen (Fridge, microwave, dishwasher, stove range, oven)
- Private Large Deck to enjoy beautiful summer days and evening.
Some bills are included:
- FREE High-Speed WiFi internet from Comcast included
- FREE Streaming TV and Netflix - included!!
- FREE Parking on Private driveway next to your entrance (1 car only) included
- FREE landscaping and snow removal in common area
- FREE water and trash removal
Tenant pays electric bill!
- 1 domesticated cat is allowed (No Dogs, sorry)
- Use of back yard - Included.
- Ceiling Fans Included.
- Close the lake and walking path for hiking, biking, jogging etc!
- Close to Derry downtown and to shopping (1.5 miles from Hannaford, Shaws, Walmart Supercenter or Panera)
- Less than 1 mile to the town beach on the lake.
NOTE: please be advised that this is second floor unit and you have to be able to climb 1 flat of stairs to access it.
This unit is considered to be an Accessory Dwelling (In-Law Unit) under NH law and its under 650 sq.ft in space, so it can only accommodate single occupancy.
Professional employment/or another verifiable source of income and good credit score is a must.
CLOSE TO: I93, Shopping, Hospitals, Town center, Theater, Town beach, schools, 20 min UMASS Lowell or SNHU,
PS: if you see this post that means that apartment is still available and accepting applications, please do not ask if its available, just tell about yourself and when you available to view it.
Showing by appointment only (email me to schedule).
Move in ready - on Sep 15 - 1 year lease (would consider shorter - minimum 9 month) month to month there after.

Close to: Derry, Londonderry, Salem, Nashua, Manchester, Windham, Atkinson, Pelham, Plaistow, Hampstead, Sandown, Chester, Auburn, Bedford, Lowell, Lawrence, Havelhill, Methuen, Dracut, Litchfield, Merrimack, Andover
